satou_camera_des2: Why is there a strong flashlight in the flash position?
moon_cake_des2: "Have you all seen the new cake today?"

fukamizu_ring_des2: Emit the power from deep sea

echoed_destiny_ring_des2: 赋予回响之命运……裁定世间之理……接而赐予一切

fracture_destiny_des2: 使用后能瞬间回复体力
trachelium_des2: “愿手中的这束花，能够传达我的深情”
fukamizu_fish_des1: 一条看起来很聪明的鱼
fukamizu_fish_des2: 食用后可以获得幸运效果

death.attack.blood_crystal.item: %1$s被%2$s用%3$s发射的凝血水晶刺穿了
ekira_pearl_des: 一颗沉甸甸的珠珠，看起来有点眼熟
momo_syringe_des1: “在这个位置的人都要被我扎屁股！”
momo_syringe_des2: 小毛护士的注射器，可以注入炽热的大福糖浆，能让人Doki Doki
haine_broadcast: Haine: Warning for emergency of Creepers
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_haine: Haibara Haibara Haibara Haine's warning: Huge load of Providence creepers detected
Elifaus villagers' imitation just a poor show!
Haiplate is just a plate, it won't do harm, right? Just let me try
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_chira: Ohayo, I am Chiram, the housekeeper from Providence land, will be your partner in later adventure
Can't sleep? Let me tell you a story. Once upon a time, there was a white porcelain throne on a mountain... Ah! Take the wrong book!
My pillow is stuffed with bricks. Do you want to be swung by my pillow?
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_keror: Kero kero! I‘m not the instrumental note block, but the shining frog block
keroro_walking: Keroro: Stepping on the Rainy Street
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_keror: I am shuffling through the rain, would you like to walk with me?
May the power of the frog crown protect every keroro fan from mosquito in summer
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_ekira: May my stars be shining beacons to guide you on your way
Listen, villagers with pineapples on heads, you no longer deserve the White Porcelain Throne! From now on, every throne in the village belongs to me!
I heard that... I can be the Gourmet of Providence after eating up all the food here
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_fukam: What is this? Huh? The Ocean Monument! Am I home? I'm sure I'm home now!
OMG, the diamond! Precious...My precious...Here is fukamizu...
Look! This is our ancestral artifact! It can control the sea. Do you want to own it?
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_louis: 既天命之引，由蛇神之智，以我之名，于此召唤，苏醒吧，玛安娜！
春种一粒粟，秋收万颗子……不过，就算这里没有季节，也应该努力耕作！
加一点下界疣，加一点烈焰粉……大火收汁，路伊丝特制美食出锅啦！
text.item.providencraft.audio_tape_elifa: 迷离的云雾亲吻了月亮，月光被掩映在我的爱之中，而你的手，轻轻拨开了我的心房，让我在无数个寂寞难耐的夜晚，呢喃着你的名字，难以入睡
des.item.providencraft.music_disc_daraku: Project Mons feat.Kurumi Usa - ダラクダテンシ(DARAKUDATENSHI)
